name: The Ferro Paradox
description:
A puzzle game about magnets, antimatter and robots!

Code, graphics and design by blinry. Music by winniehell. Made with Godot!

Arrow keys – Move
U – Undo
R – Restart level
Space – Switch bots
M – Mute music
F – Toggle fullscreen

Playtime: ~30 minutes. If you get stuck, you can press N to skip to the next level.
